Picture this…
You’re looking to build a centralized web-based tool for the central / regional mangers to input & validate the commission 
data, enable the Finance team to generate a consolidated report and process appropriate payments. Existing process of 
consolidating the performance data through excel sheets for ~110 centers every month is not sustainable and prone to errors.
Cosmetic medical service provider needs a web-based 
commissioning  tool
2
Your value is enhanced. 
•
You have reduced the manual effort for the Finance Team in processing the commissions, by ~60%
•
You have eased the process of data input and validation for the Center Managers / Regional Directors, and reduced errors
WEB-BASED COMMISSION TOOL
KEY RESULT   
•
Reduced effort by ~60%
VALUE LEVERS PULLED
•
Commission model
•
Excel VBA macros
2
You turn to Accordion. 
We partner with your team to build a centralized web-based tool to reduce the manual efforts of consolidating data in excel 
sheets from ~100 centers and streamline the processing of commissions, including:
1)
Developing a centralized tool where the Center Managers and Regional Directors can login and update the data for their 
centers and the Finance Team can review the consolidated data along with the estimated commissions in a clean format and 
process them 
2) Application to provide a custom view to the Center Managers & Regional Directors with restricted access to only the 
information of the centers within their purview, thus maintaining the confidentiality of the information provided

Accordion Value Add 
•
Existing process of consolidating the performance data through excel sheets for ~110 centers every month was not sustainable in the long run and was 
prone to manual mistakes
•
Developed a centralized tool where the Center Managers and Regional Directors can login and update the data for their centers and the Finance Team can 
review the consolidated data along with the estimated commissions in a clean format and process them 
•
Application also provided a customized view to the Center Managers & Regional Directors with restricted access to only the information of the centers 
within their purview, while maintaining the confidentiality of the information provided
Situation
•
Client had an opportunity to streamline the exiting commission payment process that is based on the data collected from the Center Managers and 
Regional Directors using Excel files (~110 Centre Managers and ~10 Regional Directors)
•
Partnered with the client to build a centralized web-based tool for the central / regional mangers to input & validate the commission data and enable the 
Finance team to generate a consolidated report and process the appropriate payments
Collating information through a centralized tool to estimate 
monthly commissions
3
Impact
•
Reduced the manual effort for the Finance Team in processing the commissions, by ~60%
•
Eased the process of data input and validation for the Center Managers / Regional Directors, and reduced errors
